title: Improve BackGround multiTasking
body: Windows Phone Lacks BackGround Tasking thats why Apps Like TrueCaller, IE application dont run in background.

comments.body: When tapping an app from the start screen or app list which is alreading in multi-tasking it should resume not relaunch from the beginning
I run continous background processing in my app (frequency analysis of the mic, if anyone cares). I'd like to control the priority of this background thread to make the user experience better.
